Start Right Terms, Referral Program & Refund Policy

This Agreement was last modified on Oct 16 2017.

Please read these Terms of Service completely using startrighttoday.com which is owned and operated by Start Right. This Agreement documents the legally binding terms and conditions attached to the use of the Site at superamazingishere.com or superamazingstore.com.

By using or accessing the Site in any way, viewing or browsing the Site, or adding your own content to the Site, you are agreeing to be bound by these Terms of Service.

Intellectual Property

The Site and all of its original content are the sole property of Start Right and are, as such, fully protected by the appropriate international copyright and other intellectual property rights laws.

Termination

Start Right reserves the right to terminate your access to the Site, without any advance notice.

Links to Other Websites

Our Site does contain a number of links to other websites and online resources that are not owned or controlled by Start Right.

Start Right has no control over, and therefore cannot assume responsibility for, the content or general practices of any of these third party sites and/or services. Therefore, we strongly advise you to read the entire terms and conditions and privacy policy of any site that you visit as a result of following a link that is posted on our site.

Governing Law

This Agreement is governed in accordance with the laws of North Carolina, United States.

Changes to This Agreement

Start Right reserves the right to modify these Terms of Service at any time. We do so by posting and drawing attention to the updated terms on the Site. Your decision to continue to visit and make use of the Site after such changes have been made constitutes your formal acceptance of the new Terms of Service.

Therefore, we ask that you check and review this Agreement for such changes on an occasional basis. Should you not agree to any provision of this Agreement or any changes we make to this Agreement, we ask and advise that you do not use or continue to access the Start Right site immediately.

Referral Program

Nobody can tell the Start Right story better than our customers.
Send your friends $10 in Start Right credit and earn 5% of everything they purchase.

How it works

  1. Tell your friends about the Start Right story.
  2. Your friend signs up and receives $10 in SR credit when they use coupon code STARTRIGHT.
  3. You earn 5% from everything your friend purchases. If they signup for Biz Pro, you’ll receive 5% every time their subscription renews. Now that’s sweet!
  4. It gets even better the more that you spread the word. Refer 20 successful paying customers and receive 20% of everything they purchase forever.

What do I need & when do I get paid?

All you need is a PayPal account so you can receive monthly payouts. I’ll process your payout on the 7th of every month. Payments clearing may depend on your bank, business days and holidays.

Where is myÂ referral link to share with my friends?

You can access your referral link here.

Refund Policy

Refund policy only applies to Start Right recurring subscriptions. In the first 30 days, if you are not happy with your website I’ve designed for you, you are entitled to a full refund of your initial payment. Upon refund, you will no longer have access to the website designed, and any content that has been stored on that domain. Customers will no longer be able to access your store online. Website deletion can not be undone.

Contact Me

If you have any questions about this Agreement, please feel free to contact me at will@startrighttoday.com.

Frequently Asked Questions

What services do you offer?

My services land in to 4 primary categories:

  1. Promotion - a combined set of marketing materials to help you reach your audience.
  2. New Business - business assets such as new websites, eCommerce stores, logos, business cards, etc to help you get off the ground running.
  3. eCommerce / Redesign - If you need a website that does it all: completely custom, ability to edit everything and training videos to get you going, then you've come to the right place.
  4. Hire me / Retainers - Need extra help or a custom build? I offerÂ Design, Web, Store maintenance, eCommerce, Photography, Logo design, a Time Machine. I can deliver.Â Available early AM, late PM.Â I speak Line, color, texture, contrast, alignment, shape, size, value, space, repetition, proximity, eCommerce, WordPress, X, Cornerstone, Drupal, Magento, Joomla, UX, HTML5, CSS3, LESS, SASS, PHP, MySQL, JS, JQUERY,Git
What does 8 hours with a retainer get me?

Here's an example of what I can do in 8 hours.

Who do you prefer to work with?

I love working with most businesses. Micro and major alike. I've worked for major companies like Zaxby's, A.B. Tech, Girls on the Run, King Bio, New Human and OM Sanctuary. I've also have worked with amazing startups such as Mobile Tech, Shmoo Media, Lil Bit's Event Planning, Human Bookkeeping, and Fill My Cup Cafe.

I appreciate most industries and have a ton of work dealing with holistic and natural companies. Cafes and restaurants will definitely benefit from my monthly promotions.

What is your specialty?

You can find many designers and developers online that can do a lot of one thing. My client base typically benefits from my extreme expertise in making print and web marketing materials completely cohesive and custom.

Try out a Start Right Promo to see what I mean. :)

Do you offer printing services?

Absolutely. Just pick what you need here, and email any FINAL assets matching design specs to will@startrighttoday.com

Why does it make sense to purchase a promotion vs individual products?

The best way to save with Start Right and get best ROI is batching specific deliverable designs. If you're running a promotion on say, "Cheese Cake," if you order flyers, banners and posters separate, you'll end up paying for a design fee for each deliverable.

With Start Right Promo, you pay for a primary or primary and secondary design fee and all of this carries down to all of your deliverables. Ultimately saving you a ton of money.
